name: The Soul of the Dead
trivia: The wandering souls of the Surfacian era will remain forever prisoners of the Galamadriabuyak tower.

name: Cursed Child's Scream
trivia: The piercing scream of a cursed child, locked up in a smelly jar. Warning: manipulate with caution!

name: Fussy Hammer
trivia: A possessed hammer that spends eternity hitting the slightest trinket that stick out from the wall. The sound it produces is unbearable to the human ear.

name: Angelica, the Angelic Angel
trivia: Angelica's obsession for healing people has been reincarnated into a cute little angel that does nothing but smiling at you. It's very effective!

name: The Void
trivia: The representation of Humans' enslavement by the Gods for eternity.

name: Waters of Chaos
description: Inflict 20 damages to the enemy and heal 15 of your health points.
trivia: In these deep and troubled waters, legends say only a true hero can see flying whales.

name: Firebolt
trivia: A little spark, a flash in the night, and everything in the area is burning for five full days !
